name: Ghosty Villa
description:
How to play:

A,D to move the character

E to talk to other character

F to check and open doors

Q to possess

TAB to check items that you collected

In order to finish the game,  you need THREE CLUES 

First clue: wounds 

Second & Third clue: when open the cupboard, finding out Cherry is lefty and an empty bottle

Fourth clue: wallet besides corpse Fifth clue: prove Cherry’s innocents
